title: Deploy App from Azure Storage
description: Deploy an app stored in an Azure container to Linux

container.description: The name of the Azure container to deploy.

storageConnectionString.description: The connection string to the Azure storage account container containing the app.

destination.description: The destination folder on the VM to deploy the app.

deployScript.description: The file name of a script included in the container that will run after all files are downloaded from the container. The file path is a relative path to the script file as stored in the storage container.  E.g. myscript.sh or mysubfolder/myscript.sh
